responses: Follow the link to get the details of the CSE faculty=https://vspgitcse.gitam.edu/Faculty

patterns: What is the area of the campus
How many acres is the campus
How much area does the campus cover
responses: The campus covers over 117 acres

patterns: How many departments does GITAM University have
How many departments does the university have in total
how many schools are there in GITAM
How many schools are there in the college
responses: The institute consists of 12 departments in total

patterns: what is the best department in GITAM
what is the best department in the university
which one of the schools is the excellent school
responses: The GITAM institute of technology is the best school in the campus

patterns: Does the college conduct sports competitions
responses: GITAM provide sports facilities to the students. We also have a Director of Sports and many sports clubs conducting various different activities for the students.

patterns: How much is the college tuition fee
what is the tuition fee for the total study
how much is the total cost of study
responses: Here is the comprehensive list of the tuition fee of all the courses available=https://www.gitam.edu/fee-structure

patterns: Does GITAM provide transport facility to the students
does the university provide commuting facilities to the students
responses: The college doesn't provide any transport facilities. However, the APSRTC buses are available which helps the students commute to the college

patterns: Does the college have lab facilities
can students experience the labs in the college
Does the college provide lab facilities to learners
responses: GITAM has many number of labs across all the departments available over the three campuses. Students conduct extensive research in these state-of-the-art labs facilities.

patterns: Does the college have student clubs
does the university provide student bodies
does GITAM have clubs and chapters
responses: There are many different clubs and chapters for the students. For more information regarding the clubs, visit=https://www.gitam.edu/student-clubs

patterns: Is GITAM accredited to any college
Is the college accredited to Andhra University
responses: GITAM is a Deemed to be University and is not accredited to any university
GITAM has a central library which is known as the Knowledge Resource Center. Moreover, each school have their own department libraries in their respective campus buildings.

patterns: What is the address of the GITAM
responses: GITAM's main campus is located in Rushionda, Visakhapatnam., PIN: 530045

patterns: How many campuses does GITAM have
responses: GITAM has three campuses located in Visakhapatnam, Hyderabad and Banglore

patterns: Which is the main campus of GITAM
responses: The main campus of GITAM is located in Visakhapatnam

patterns: What career options does studeent have
responses: GITAM encourages students to follow their passion. Our college provide support to students for Jobs, Higher studies, competitive exams, business etc
GITAM provides many student housing facilities independent to both men and women
GITAM provides many dining halls across the campus. Students can use their hungerbox subscription to dine at any hall
